basics.name: Samuel Riddle
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Solutions-driven Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing, automating, and maintaining high-traffic web applications and software solutions. Proven ability to build, mentor, and lead teams of engineers and developers in order to achieve organizational goals.

work.name: Near
highlights: Implemented CI/CD pipelines using BuildKite, Packer, Terraform, Ansible, and GitHub Actions, reducing toil and enabling faster, more reliable deployments.
Developed indexer service in Rust to ingest real-time blockchain JSON-RPC data, stream it through Kafka, and store it in Postgres, resulting in an increase in block processing speed.

Created a custom, cloud-native API gateway using Kong, Redis, Prometheus, and Kubernetes, enabling features such as rate limiting, caching mechanisms, bot detection, custom plugins, and advanced authentication.

work.name: Adobe
highlights: Designed and implemented an internal monitoring, maintenance, and auto-remediation solution for distributed systems, enabling observability among Digital Experience teams.
Managed and configured global infrastructure consisting of over 4,000 on-premises Linux servers, ensuring high availability, performance, disaster recovery, and security across all locations.
Successfully migrated legacy applications to containerized solutions using Docker and orchestrated deployments with Kubernetes, enhancing scalability, resource efficiency, and ease of management.
